text: Kogda zh zapretnyye chetyre mesyatsa proydut, (My dozvolyayem vam) nevernykh ubivat' Vezde, gde b vy ikh ni nashli: Zakhvatyvayte (v plen) ikh, osazhdayte (ikh doma) I stav'te im zasady. No kol' raskayutsya oni i obratyatsya, Molitvu budut soblyudat' I budut milostynyu pravit', Togda otkroyte im dorogu, - Allakh, poistine, proshchayushch, miloserd
